stories.text:
Can you give me the URL of a HN article, published between March and January (both inclusive), bound to an article written by a spy that explained how to get people to like you and influence them please? (A spy or someone working in the secret service of a country)

I think I remember one of the things he advised was to make people feel like they were making a choice.
stories.title: Ask HN: I ask for the link of an article of personal development published on HN
Show HN: SimpleKV – an simple, anonymous key-value store

stories.text: Regardless of type: music, paintings, drawings, literature, movies, video games, sculpture, architecture etc.
stories.title: Ask HN: What recent art (last ~20 years) will be well known in 500 years?
How Good Is Monterey’s Visual Look Up?
New cost policies: catch mistakes and budget-breaking changes in CI
Recipes for dealing with the plague in Shakespeare’s England
Restoring and attributing ancient texts using deep neural networks
